review: I went for my father treatment of total knee replacement of 2knees. He diagnosed. Now my father is feeling well. After 2days of surgery my father can walk with Walker without hesitation. dr. Naveen Reddy P. successfully completed both knees replacement surgery. I would like to say thanks to doctor Naveen P. Reddy for his best diagnosis. Excellent doctor in Orthopedics.

Recently I fall at home and had difficulty to walk. I lost movement in my right leg with unbearable pain. Consulted Dr. Naveen Reddy sir. He diagnosed quickly that I have had fracture at neck of Right Femur, and advised to go for surgery and it is compulsory. 
He executed RT HEMI ORTHO PLASTY HIP CEMENTED Surgery, with his team at Apolo Hospital, Secunderabad on 2nd October 2021.
Now, post surgery pains are there. I can see improvement in my leg movements. Hopefully I may walk again in months time. I found him, very kind, helpful, encouraging and humble.
Thank you so much sir. I remember you for entire my life.
- Ramesh Chandra (52yrs. Old)

I went to him for a severe lower back pain and he dint listen to me and just gave me some pain meds. I later called him with a question and he was extremely rude *** ***********. Would not recommend him at all.

tags: Wait time,Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr. Naveen is punctual, down to earth, spot on diagnosis and inpires faith and confidence. I feel safe in his hands.
